item.description:
We will be meeting at Cafe St Petersburg in Newton Center for dinner and an evening of traditional Gypsy and Russian music.

http://www.cafestpete...

"A taste of old Russia in Newton Center..."
We offer Russian Cuisine, colorful and rich in flavor and tradition.

"On some nights, our pianist plays dramatic gypsy music and flourishes of Tchaikovsky; other nights, Russian romances drift over the dining room. Sometimes a night can become an impromptu concert."

Here's a link to the menu:

http://www.cafestpete...

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Russian Restaurant and Traditional Gypsy Music
